topic.title: Bootstrap Extension
topic.shortdesc: Incorporate the Bootstrap Extension library as a separate plug-in to support additional features that are not included in vanilla Bootstrap 5.x.

section.title: Extending Bootstrap
section.p: Bootstrap is designed to be extensible. Additional CSS and JavaScript libraries can be added to the generated HTML pages to allow for new Bootstrap components and extend Bootstrap classes. Similarly, the DITA Bootstrap plug-in itself can be extended to process DITA files to create valid Bootstrap HTML to drive these custom components.

The DITA Bootstrap Extension is a DITA-OT plug-in that incorporates the Bootstrap Extension library and adds the necessary CSS and JavaScript — for sliders, whitebox galleries, parallax components, greyscale images and additional styling options.
